Use SCPA to compare gene sets

Source: R/ComparePathways.R
compare_pathways.Rd

This function takes an input of samples and pathways to compare gene sets over different conditions.

compare_pathways(
  samples,
  pathways,
  downsample = 500,
  min_genes = 15,
  max_genes = 500
)

Arguments

samples

List of samples, each supplied as an expression matrix
pathways

List of pathways and their genes
downsample

Option to downsample cell numbers. Default is 500
min_genes

Gene sets with fewer than this number of genes will be excluded
max_genes

Gene sets with more than this number of genes will be excluded

Value

Statistical results from the SCPA analysis. If only two samples are provided, an enrichment score will also be calculated.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
scpa_result <- compare_pathways(
     list(sample1, sample2, sample3),
     pathways = pathways)
}
